ValidationRule.description: OIF that does not allow saving an OIF line with empty Rev Rec Plan if Account related to the Opportunity does contain 'North America'.(Req:1440)
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( CONTAINS( Opportunity__r.Account.L4Name__c , 'North America'), ISBLANK( Rev_RecPlan_Receipt__c ), $Profile.Name <> $Label.Data_Loader_Profile_Name )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please Fill The Rev Rec Plan.
